item.title: Revisiting Prompt Engineering: A Comprehensive Evaluation for LLM-based Personalized Recommendation
LLM-based Query Expansion Fails for Unfamiliar and Ambiguous Queries
Relevance, Diversity, and Exclusivity: Designing Keyword-augmentation Strategy for Zero-shot Classifiers
Context Quality Matters in Training Fusion-in-Decoder for Extractive Open-Domain Question Answering
1st place on AIO3rd
item.description:
Our team Revo (Takeoka, Akimoto, Hayashi, and Oyamada) won AIO 3rd, a Japanese Quiz AI competition (2022/09 - 2022/12). The goal of the competition is to find optimal answers for given quizzes without any context accurately. Revo has achieved 93.8% accuracy on the test set.

AI王 〜クイズAI日本一決定戦〜第3回にて我々のチーム レヴォ が前回に続き優勝しました． レヴォは93.8%の正解率(完全一致率)を達成しました．

item.title: 1st place on AIO2nd
item.description:
Our team Revo (Akimoto & Takeoka) won AIO 2nd, a Japanese Quiz AI competition (2021/10 - 2022/03). The goal of the competition is to find optimal answers for given quizzes without any context accurately. Revo has achieved 83.9% accuracy on the test set.

AI王 〜クイズAI日本一決定戦〜第2回にて我々のチーム レヴォ が優勝しました． レヴォは83.9%の完全一致率を達成しました．

item.title: Low-resource Taxonomy Enrichment with Pretrained Language Models
Quality Control for Hierarchical Classification with Incomplete Annotations
Efficient Joinable Table Discovery in Data Lake: A High-Dimensional Similarity-Based Approach
Yotta Free
item.description: Yotta Free is a Mac app for making users look drunk. Using both this app and a video conferencing app, you can enjoy online drinking parties without alcohol. Yotta Free changes your face and voice to look drunk in real-time. This app is used face segmentation face-parsing.Pytorch and vocoder PyWorld inside. This app is developed with my friends in a one-day hackathon HackDay 2021.

item.title: Continuous top-k spatial–keyword search on dynamic objects
Insticker
item.description: Insticker is a system for instantly generating a sticker from a target word and your emotion. This system works with a laptop PC and a cutting plotter. Insticker project is in a one-day hackathon HackDay 2019.

item.title: Meimei: An Efficient Probabilistic Approach for Semantically Annotating Tables
HELLO WORLD!
item.description:
HELLO WORLD! is a web application for pair programming and video meeting. Pair programming is often used in education for programming, however, it is difficult to find a good teacher in your neighborhood. HELLO WORLD! helps them to do pair programming online.

Features:

  • Edit codes at the same time
  • Chat in video communication
  • Run codes in a browser

This project is joint work with my friends in a hackathon JPHacks 2016. This is an overview of the project and its detail is here in Japanese.
